name: Scrap Metal
description: A piece of rusty metal of indeterminate origin. Useful for reinforcing structures or creating rudimentary weapons.

name: High Quality Scrap Metal
description: A piece of superior alloy metal, less corroded and more resistant. Perfect for quality repairs and creations.

name: Tech Components
description: Circuits, wires, and chips recovered from old electronic devices. Essential for repairing or creating technological items.

name: Copper Wire
description: A roll of copper wire, excellent conductor. Useful for electric traps or electronic repairs.

name: Nylon Wire
description: An extremely strong and thin synthetic wire. Ideal for traps, fishing lines, or makeshift sutures.

name: Durable Cloth
description: A piece of thick and sturdy canvas, like that used for sails or military tents. Great for repairing backpacks or creating light armor.

name: Animal Hide
description: The raw hide of an animal. If tanned, it can be turned into leather for armor and other items.

name: Mutant Wolf Pelt
description: The unusually thick and resistant hide of a mutated wolf. A high-quality material for armor.

name: Meteorite Fragment
description: A piece of metal of strange shape, not terrestrial. It is strangely light and cold to the touch.

name: Fulgurite Shard
description: A fragment of natural glass, created by lightning striking sand. Coursing with strange energy, it is warm to the touch.

name: Obsidian Shard
description: A piece of black volcanic glass, razor sharp. Perfect for creating arrowheads or improvised blades.

name: Ash Petals
description: The petals of a surreal flower the color of ash. Their pollen has slight soporific and antiseptic properties.

name: Basic Chemicals
description: A container with various recovered chemicals. Could be used to create explosives, solvents, or drugs.

name: Firewood
description: Dry wood, perfect for starting a fire.

name: Spider Silk
description: Spider silk thread, incredibly strong and light.

name: Hammer
description: A carpenter's hammer, useful for building and destroying.

name: Box of Nails
description: A box full of nails of various sizes.

name: Garden Tools
description: A small set of tools for cultivating the land.

name: Rubber Gasket
description: A rubber gasket, useful for plumbing repairs.

name: Rubber Ball
description: A rubber ball, can be used as a distraction.

name: Resistant Wire
description: A strong metal wire, useful for traps or repairs.

name: Small Metal Piece
description: Small pieces of metal, useful for crafting.

name: Grain Sack
description: A sack of dry grain, still edible if ground.

name: Cleaning Supplies
description: Solvents and chemical reagents, useful for creating compounds.

name: Dry Paper
description: Sheets of dry paper, perfect for starting a fire or as crafting material.

name: Military Grade Electronics
description: Robust and shielded electronic components, recovered from military equipment. Extremely rare and valuable for advanced crafting.

name: Empty Bottle
description: An empty glass or plastic bottle. Perfect for collecting and purifying water.

name: Contaminated Water
description: Water from an uncertain source, turbid and potentially dangerous. Must be purified before drinking.

name: Adhesive Tape
description: Roll of strong adhesive tape. Useful for quick repairs and improvisations.

name: Clean Cloth
description: A piece of clean cloth, ideal for makeshift bandages or improvised filters.

name: Portable Generator
description: A small gasoline generator, still functioning. Can provide electricity for short periods.

name: Industrial Filter
description: A filter for water purification plants. Heavy but essential for purifying large quantities of water.

name: Heavy Vehicle Battery
description: An industrial battery from a truck or generator. Heavy but with enormous energy capacity.

name: Hydraulic Systems Maintenance Manual
description: A detailed technical manual on the maintenance of water purification plants. Precious knowledge of the lost world.
